abstract: Bureaucratic obstacles that have left Syrian infant Sham Aldaher stranded in Jordan and unable to travel to Barcelona hospital for surgery she urgently needs is example of shortcoming of efforts on part of Western countries to respond in coordinated and efficient way to influx of refugees.

headline.print_headline: Red Tape on Spanish Visa Leaves Syrian Girl’s Surgery in Limbo
headline.main: Red Tape on Spanish Visa Leaves Syrian Girl’s Surgery in Limbo

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The girl, not yet a year old, is stranded with her family in Jordan as lawyers try to clear the way for her to receive an urgent and complex operation.
lead_paragraph: The girl, not yet a year old, is stranded with her family in Jordan as lawyers try to clear the way for her to receive an urgent and complex operation.
